{"id":854978787,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6Â months","timestamp":1670239235,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/854978787/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Divide Two Integers","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int divide(int dividend, int divisor) {\n        long long ans=0;\n        int a;\n        long long dividend1 = abs(dividend);\n        long long divisor1 = abs(divisor);\n        a= 1-2*int(dividend==dividend1^divisor==divisor1);\n        \n\n        while(dividend1>=divisor1){\n            dividend1-=divisor1;\n            ans++;\n        }\n        if(ans>=pow(2,31)){\n            if(a==1){\n                return pow(2,31)-1;\n            }\n            else{\n                return -pow(2,31);\n            }\n        }\n        return a*ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"divide-two-integers","has_notes":false}
